settings.text: In our cafes, Night Swim Coffee offers the same thoughtfully prepared food and beverages, attention to detail, and hospitable atmosphere that is enjoyed in the legacy Not Just Coffee and Undercurrent Coffee cafes, but in a setting designed in a collaborative effort across the team to create a unique experience at every location.

Night Swim Coffee houses its roasting operations in Charlotte alongside an in-house cafe which together with the roastery serves as the epicenter of our concept. The facility highlights state-of-the art equipment and training that provides high quality and sustainable experiences to our guests.

settings.title: Our Name
settings.text: In deciding on a name for this collaborative venture, we chose Night Swim Coffee to embody nostalgia, invoke feelings of excitement, adventure, and presence that are central to the experience that we seek to create, both in our cafes or simply when our coffee is consumed!

Night Swim Coffee strives to narrate our coffees, honoring the places they come from and the people that dedicate their lives to producing them. Both of our blends, espresso and filter, base their composition on balance. Each blend serves a different purpose and is therefore balanced in a particular way.

This balance also exists in relation to the coffees that compose the blend and is subject to change solely based on taste. Moreover, the blend components and the composition are curated with an eye towards seasonal availability and ease of access. The core idea behind our Single-Origin (“SO”) offerings is simply quality. The program is centered on seasonality and our best attempt to provide fresh-crop offerings as they become available and exhausted before they exhibit any characteristics of aging. The SO menu also provide various processing and varietal options to highlight the width and depth of flavors, regions, and farm-level inputs. The core driver of this part of the Night Swim Coffee menu is cupping Single-Origin offerings blind and choosing those coffees which elevate themselves above the rest in both quality and profile.

We hope that we can share in life’s adventure with you, and
that our passion will play a part in elevating yours.
Join our mailing list to remain in the loop about current offerings, new blog posts, and educational material.
